entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.10 release schedule
entry.summary: On October 26, 2014, a user named odinn inquired about transaction fee changes and txconfirmtarget in Bitcoin Core 0.10. The user asked whether the floating fees for Core 0.10 were included, as described on bitcoinfoundation.org. In response, Wladimir confirmed that the floating/smart fees had been merged into Core 0.10 through two GitHub pull requests: pull #3959 and pull #4250.
